A career mode, maybe even interstellar travel of some kind. And of course about 96 duodecillion other smaller things.

The aim of the game is in the game's title.

you are limited only by your imagination. Just with the stock parts and pieces in place currently, let alone the mods avalible, there are some truly amazing builds out there. Base stations. interplanetary ship orbital builds, space stations, rover designs, aircraft, sto's, boats. think there have even been a few submarines. Aim for what you want
